item.title: Git History Statistics Generator
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: GitStats, a Git history statistics generation tool written in Python, can generate detailed code submission statistical reports to help developers analyze project activity and contributor information.
